thread.title: URMC acts to ensure privacy of patient health data
thread.title_full: URMC acts to ensure privacy of patient health data

title: URMC acts to ensure privacy of patient health data
text:
RSS Democrat and Chronicle , July 10, 2015 
The University of Rochester Medical Center will be reminding its doctors, nurses and other care providers that they must adhere to strict rules set up to protect patients' private health care information. "There are do's and don'ts, and those are being very clearly spelled out in the policy guidelines that we're drafting," said David Kirshner, senior vice president and chief financial officer for the medical center. Kirshner said the bolstered guidelines should be in the hands of medical center faculty and staff by the end of August.
